body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, my name is Christian Scott and I'm a customer service agent at AutoMax Car Dealership. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi Christian, my name is Heather Davis.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Heather. Can you kindly confirm your phone number for verification purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's five five five, two three four, one zero zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And can you also provide your email address so we can send you updates and promotions?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for providing that information, Heather. We have updated your contact details. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, thank you. I appreciate your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Heather. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day.
